Articles.Content:
When we are looking the list of vessels on Tracking Station, we have some information like the duration of mission and name of body the craft is orbiting. I suggest adding the number of kerbals on board the vessel to that list.

Example:

Kerbal X

MET: 1 day 2 hours 45 minutes

Orbiting Kerbin. 2 of 3 Kerbals on board

Thanks!
